net.sf.JRecord.External

Interface CopybookLoader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.sf.JRecord.Option.ICobolSplitOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICopybookLoaderCobol, ICopybookLoaderStream
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCopybookLoader, CobolCopybookLoader, CopybookLoaderFactory.NoCb2xml, CsvNamesFirstLineFileLoader, CsvNamesFirstLineFileLoader.Tab, DbCsvCopybookLoader, RecordEditorCsvLoader.Comma, RecordEditorCsvLoader.Tab, RecordEditorXmlLoader, XmlCopybookLoader, XmlFileLoader

    public interface CopybookLoader
extends net.sf.JRecord.Option.ICobolSplitOptions
    description of a class to load a copybook (i.e. Record Layout or Record Description) into a ExteranlRecord (general purpose interface class).
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.sf.JRecord.Option.ICobolSplitOptions

        SPLIT_01_LEVEL, SPLIT_HIGHEST_REPEATING, SPLIT_NONE, SPLIT_REDEFINE, SPLIT_TOP_LEVEL

        ExternalRecord loadCopyBook(java.lang.String copyBookFile,
                          int splitCopybookOption,
                          int dbIdx,

                          int binFormat,
                          int systemId,
                          AbsSSLogger log)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Read an Copybook from a file into the internal exchange format (ExternalRecord) This can be converted to a LayoutDetail via
        Parameters:
        copyBookFile - Copy Book file Name
        splitCopybookOption - weather to split a copy book on a redefine
        dbIdx - Database Index
        font - font name to use
        binFormat - binary format to use
        systemId - System Identifier
        log - log where any messages should be written
        Returns:
        Copybook that has been read in (ExternalRecord)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any error that occurs
